overview.summary: Make a new field with data at nodes instead of elements.

description.p: MoveElemToNode creates a new field with the data at the mesh nodes rather than at the elements. This currently only works on LatVolField, StructHexVolField, ImageField, and StuctQuadSurfField field types. The data must be at cells/faces as appropriate to the field type. A new field is created such that the data remains at the same positions in space but occupy the nodes of the new mesh rather than being located at the cell/face locations. This is the opposite of .

net.title: MoveElemToNode-img Regression Test
net.p: Test the MoveElemToNode module by moving the data in an ImageField from the faces onto the nodes while retaining the same data locations. The ImageField is transformed first so that the positions are better tested.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/FieldsData/MoveElemToNode-img.net.

net.title: MoveElemToNode-lat Regression Test
net.p: Test the MoveElemToNode module by moving the data in a LatVolField from the cells onto the nodes while retaining the same data locations. The LatVolField is transformed first so that the positions are better tested.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/FieldsData/MoveElemToNode-lat.net.
